question: What is the first step when joining a team project on GitHub?

choices.text: Clone the repository to your local machine

question: What's the recommended workflow for contributing to a team project?

choices.text: Create a feature branch, make changes, push, and open a PR
Only the team lead can make changes

question: How do you keep your local repository in sync with the team?

choices.text: Regularly pull or fetch changes from the remote

question: Good communication is as important as Git skills when collaborating.
What should you do before starting work on a new feature?

choices.text: Pull the latest changes and create a new branch from main
